# Kujira Live Peers
Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
PEERS=644c346a03df3dc587ae190d7d944b96a31f5eef@198.244.179.125:30329,5ae54af5483ff090e57a51f9f3568490373e2419@135.181.26.211:26656,377510fb7c0ee3cacd1a46dbf13b45a4e1525fa6@141.95.124.226:32011,ccffabe81f2de8a81e171f93fe1209392bf9993f@65.108.234.59:26656,f46cdadb43b2078fba2a8b261e0109c18967fdaf@95.214.55.140:21156,4018be5af4189573366762fa168826b4408418db@135.125.188.17:32095,0743497e30049ac8d59fee5b2ab3a49c3824b95c@198.244.200.196:26656,0ea1ccc090652ed16751570c9e816e9df8a1bf3c@54.235.174.123:26656,6f3129d01218b939511cccf7e0318bfe872d97c4@65.109.33.181:26656,28c1c1a9183abf671cb0a8f6965c67428854665c@198.244.202.166:26656,5d0f0bc1c2d60f1d273165c5c8cefc3965c3d3c9@65.108.233.175:26656,3a7733d4b670a672db326bd6e5f8ae37e14a3dbd@138.201.226.227:26656,ecafd5cadaf3526a588550a7bc343ce2670c988d@185.16.39.231:26656,62efd8a1c12efcab6bcfe854b5cf76e0d6ca04ce@51.91.153.78:31726,897c55fb33076c9cecc56f6c04e2a3cbed195e7c@185.248.24.20:26796,35af92154fdb2ac19f3f010c26cca9e5c175d054@65.108.238.61:27656,98a6a264d2f2f5093d317f09e71036e62aa73906@107.181.235.66:20656,f62a0842be95a33b191879c977eed2072e37926b@57.128.20.147:30256,b12591db8b67f7a78b2834b5c122299fdb6c8deb@65.108.201.154:2060,4c1f4d9358118cb8917567702c12ca4f31714b32@65.108.132.107:26656,7ce3988ad06172aa22856e1c3ec7940dd01c2592@95.217.144.25:15602,d3cbe679ef7e491d3b34f6557bde23077f28e21f@77.22.195.34:26656,c615d21d94fddc9131bae3b32730a5c5a8600fee@95.214.54.109:26656,94b124a422113f1871c3ea750097842004e4a095@18.222.185.33:26656,94469c0d109e00e65d62a307f7ab3dc109c01055@65.108.238.104:11856,129771a48f43b83c6144c7d282ad1da62434cc07@15.204.197.12:26656,da2673cf09dc2c124947827f4cf5e7c17114d504@142.132.202.98:26656,a586bb5aeb2b3492c5a5f68b7cf96f2440ef5deb@139.162.153.235:26656,a0927acbf1e931fc16e11e454b328c991e56d3fe@51.89.155.17:44656,f6d0d3ac0c748a343368705c37cf51140a95929b@146.59.81.204:36656,eb9742d81b436b95e324816794229a9efdaf8ea8@142.132.155.170:26656,d6d14f99ef25c8ffee6fa4afca40fece0c1ab9fe@107.181.229.154:20656,a429a1fa5cc1e8757b6bbc
```
